aiGeneratedWorkspaceTrust.title: This workspace was generated by GitHub Copilot
aiGeneratedWorkspaceTrust.checkboxText: Trust the contents of all files in this workspace
aiGeneratedWorkspaceTrust.dontTrustOption: No, I don't trust the contents
aiGeneratedWorkspaceTrust.startupTrustRequestLearnMore: If you don't trust the contents of the files generated by GitHub Copilot, we recommend continuing in restricted mode. See [our docs](https://aka.ms/vscode-workspace-trust) to learn more.

gitHubEntitlement.confirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to install GitHub Copilot?

ms-vscode.sublime-keybindings.name: Sublime Text Keymap and Settings Importer
